name: Witch Hunt (Demo)
description:
After a LONG time of work, bad times, and good times, the demo for Witch Hunt is finally complete.

Thank you for everybody who has stuck with me as I've been doing this, you are all loved and appreciated so much <3

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Witch Hunt is a 2D platformer about a young witch called Spook! Her goal is to retrieve her missing cauldron, that a dastardly evil witch stole from her home.

Traverse through Phantom Field, the place of Spook's home, and slay some spooky scoundrels, in the name of magic!
